title: r/AmITheA**hole For Suing A Karen?
description: r/AmITheA**hole In today's episode, OP is dating a guy who has a mother from hell. This woman has made it her life mission to destroy OP in any way possible. She even tries to frame OP by trying to secretly cancel her own son's motorcycle insurance. Eventually, enough is enough and OP decides to press charges against the woman for trying to ruin her life. Does this make her the butthole in this situation? If you like this content, be sure to subscribe for more daily Reddit uploads!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
